name: Slack Backup
description: Periodically backup your slack chat logs, and view them on a web server

SLACK_USER.description: Username of slack user with permissions to read from slack.

SLACK_BACKUP_DIR.description: Directory to backup files into, if you don't know, default to ~/Downloads

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS IAM access key information to store the backup zipfile

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS IAM secret access key information to store the backup zipfile

BUCKET_NAME.description: Name of the S3 bucket to store the backup zipfile. Needs to be pre-existing. Make using AWS CLI or web interface.
